title: i18n en US saptrc
content:
# i18n_en_US_saptrc.properties

```properties

#specific keys+text combination that overwrite template keys+text
#scan the original i18n of the template component for the keys
#you can find it by starting the application in the WebIDE with a run configuration that has unchecked 'open with frame'
#and modify the URL in the browser to /resources/sap/suite/ui/generic/template/<template component name>/i18n/i18n.properties
#<EXISTING_KEY>=<new text for the key>

#YMSG: No Category found
ymsg.NoSupplierFound=Plt7iO63LUe4zaTi8V/GkA_No Supplier found
#XTIT:Supplier Name
xtit.SelectSupplier=ugC+qijht+jIB5xfzDokCQ_Select Supplier

# XTIT,30: title of the page in ListReport.view.xml, this may be replaced by the application
PAGEHEADER=ToQLlAz7jPCDTpDccNFKYg_Manage Products
# XBUT,32: shown as tooltip on plus or create sign; ; "object" to be redefined. example: Create New Product
CREATE_NEW_OBJECT=2iK/HfAABKRRzIkm5ohKtg_Create New Product

#YMSG, 100: Unsaved Changes check box text. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_UNSAVED_CHANGES_CHECKBOX=4GgXgnSXB2HIvSgLCimVIg_Also delete products with unsaved changes
#YMSG, 100: Delete selected item text. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_SELECTED=cUJDzNythzIOb3Z9jAO9hQ_Delete product?
#YMSG, 100: Delete selected items text. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_SELECTED_PLURAL=HiPkJy29KX77wJZtFLLAfw_Delete the selected products?
#YMSG, 150: Delete unsaved changes items text. Parameter: {1}= user name. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_UNSAVED_CHANGES=dByg629p5sncbWbYyIgSTg_Another user edited this product without saving the changes\: \n{1} \n\nDelete anyway?
#YMSG, 150: Delete unsaved changes items text. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_UNSAVED_CHANGES_PLURAL=3ka9STCrtTzEtphCaiEUjw_Other users have edited the selected products without saving the changes. \n\nDelete them anyway?
#YMSG, 150: Delete locked item text. Parameter: {1}= user name. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_LOCKED=fYtqSweLr5hhE3M2BlHk3A_This product cannot be deleted. It is currently locked by {1}.
#YMSG, 150: Delete locked items text. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_LOCKED_PLURAL=5cGbaww+FPOPQXxJiexeYw_The selected products are currently locked by other users and cannot be deleted.
#YMSG, 150: Currently locked items text. Parameter: {0}= items count. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_CURRENTLY_LOCKED=1bmQwueE3ajC0Gd5/WM/nA_1 of {0} products is currently locked.
#YMSG, 150: Currently locked items text. Parameters: {0}= locked items count, {1}= items count."objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_CURRENTLY_LOCKED_PLURAL=eks+eYbW3FhVcepFH1NuVw_{0} of {1} products are currently locked by other users and cannot be deleted.
#YMSG, 150: Delete the remaining item text. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_REMAINING=wmC+cX01pwploOnIo97jkA_Do you still want to delete the remaining products?
#YMSG, 150: Delete the remaining items text. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_REMAINING_PLURAL=OnhuM41YGyzrpLkUR7Ruww_Do you still want to delete the remaining {0} products?
#YMSG, 150: Delete the remaining item with unsaved changes text. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_REMAINING_UNSAVED_CHANGES=PUkuENnxdBDViEGVwFslfg_The remaining product has unsaved changes. \n\nDo you still want to delete it?
#YMSG, 150: Delete the remaining items with unsaved changes text. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_REMAINING_UNSAVED_CHANGES_PLURAL=TtnZGApsAUDkbvmWPlVrLw_The remaining products have unsaved changes by other users. \n\nDo you still want to delete them?
#YMSG, 100: Delete success message. "objects" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_SUCCESS_PLURAL=iMaKkUQPAW1oEWiXbNTRNQ_The selected products have been deleted.
#YMSG, 100: Delete error message. "objects" to be redefined. 
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_ERROR=A0/pLq6JDkVMdF1bFG3sNQ_The selected product cannot be deleted.
#YMSG, 100: Delete error message. "objects" to be redefined. 
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_ERROR_PLURAL=48y60gGpLBPMbQECBvZrMQ_The selected products cannot be deleted.
#YMSG, 100: Delete success message. Parameter: {0}= deleted item as count (1). "objects" to be redefined. 
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_SUCCESS_WITH_COUNT=kaFiW2tizCe7+qxk1afqYw_{0} product has been deleted. 
#YMSG, 100: Delete success message. Parameter: {0}= deleted items count. "objects" to be redefined. 
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_SUCCESS_PLURAL_WITH_COUNT=N5bBKaj+QytAD8ckTnVZDA_{0} products have been deleted.
#YMSG, 100: Delete error message. Parameter: {0}= non-deleted item as count (1)."object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_ERROR_WITH_COUNT=i2jQR4BsLDUQPpY4clMvSg_{0} product cannot be deleted.
#YMSG, 100: Delete error message. Parameter: {0}= non-deleted items as count."objects" to be redefined. 
ST_GENERIC_DELETE_ERROR_PLURAL_WITH_COUNT=2TV2DWHzodhL51WAmSvaLA_{0} products cannot be deleted.

#XMSG: Message box text for draft discarded. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_OBJECT_DELETED=byCF754k11kVA8BSv0dL/Q_The product has been deleted.

#YMSG,70: used in pop-over showing draft admin data. Parameter: {0}= user name. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_LOCKED_OBJECT_POPOVER_TEXT=y02XQ4PilZJEBtbnb9rhcQ_This product is being edited by {0}.
#YMSG,70: used in pop-over showing draft admin data. Parameter: {0}= user name. "object" to be redefined.
ST_GENERIC_UNSAVED_OBJECT_POPOVER_TEXT=Hx/+x0nwvcxogOsKL6wJ/A_This product has unsaved changes by {0}.

```
